caption.title: Repeat viral load results of samples that were undetectable in test 1: The proportion of samples that were undetectable or <20 copies/mL, 20–100 copies/mL, 100–500 copies/mL, 500–1000 copies/mL or >1000 copies/mL on repeat testing are shown.
caption.p: In (a) samples that were stored at 4°C for 72, 96 and 168 hours, (b) samples that were stored at 20°C and (c) samples that were stored at 30°C.
